page.title: 05Stepaside Village People.
page.content: Mr. Richard Howells gets up in the morning then after dressing and shaving he watches "Breakfast Time" on T.V.a.m. At 8 o'clock he goes to work at Texaco an oil refinery near Pembroke. His favourite type of television programme is anything to do with sport. The papers he reads are The Daily Mirror, Times, News of the World, The Express, Sunday People and the Sunday Mirror. Kathryn Howells is his sister. She is l8 years old and head girl at Greenhill Comprehensive School, Tenby where all Secondary School pupils go from this area. She gets up at 7.45 a.m. She listens to Mike Reid on the radio then she catches the Silcox 'bus for Tenby at 8.20. She likes watching soap operas. Her favourite foods are chips, chocolates and fresh fruit.
